actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act, as amended, to eliminate certain limitations on the use of Federal funds for social service programs.

summary.text: Eliminates specified limitations and restrictions on the use of Federal funds for social service programs under Title XI (General Provisions and Professional Standards Review Organizations) of the Social Security Act. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 1320b(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act, as amended, to eliminate certain limitations on the use of Federal funds for social service programs.
